name: mdadm Monitor
description: Ensures the mdadm (RAID) monitor service is running.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active mdmonitor >/dev/null 2>&1 || systemctl is-active mdadm >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart mdmonitor >/dev/null 2>&1 || systemctl restart mdadm >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; fi
verify_cmd: if systemctl is-active mdmonitor >/dev/null 2>&1 || systemctl is-active mdadm >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
